Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2013 01:09PM ms0305 wrote: hey there... i had my lumpectomy just 3 days back...and no the dye didn't burn much...do not worry about it... they do poke u a lot though...just hang in there...u will get through this...all the best :)

Posts.Content: Jun 30, 2013 10:52AM ms0305 wrote: was diagnosed only 2 days back...I'm 27...married...have a huge family history of cancer...basically I have seen only this all my life was in shock but now ready to fight this...have my awesome husband, my parents and in-laws by my side... I will fight this :)
